snippet: The “Carmina Burana” specialist Rafael Frühbeck de Burgos came from Spain to lead the New York Philharmonic in Orff’s 1936 blockbuster.
abstract: James R Oestreich reviews performance by the New York Philharmonic, featuring conductor Rafael Fruhbeck de Burgos and the Orfeon Pamplones singers from Spain, at Avery Fisher Hall.
lead_paragraph: The “Carmina Burana” specialist Rafael Frühbeck de Burgos came from Spain to lead the New York Philharmonic in Orff’s 1936 blockbuster.

headline.seo: Orff’s ‘Carmina Burana’ by Philharmonic at Avery Fisher
headline.main: ‘Carmina Burana’ Specialists From Spain Enliven a Favorite
headline.print_headline: ‘Carmina Burana’ Specialists From Spain Enliven a Favorite
